item.title: Sydney Harbour Bridge Climb
item.author: @huatuostudio
item.description:
The Experience

John has bought me a ticketÂ for a full 3 hours ofÂ Sydney Harbour Bridge ClimbÂ for my birthday this year (thank you John!! ğŸ’• ). I have to say that I have always thought the bridge climb is an overpriced tourist thing. Why would I ever do that if I live here?! :) Nevertheless, I was excited to wake up at 3am to get ready for the bridge climb.
